mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_PW, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_NICNAME, MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_PHONE, MEMBER_ADDR , MEMBER_IP, MEMBER_GRADE , MEMBER_JOIN , MEMBER_NOTIFY, MEMBER_FACE, MEMBER_AUTO FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_GRADE = '일반회원' OR MEMBER_GRADE='강사회원' ORDER BY MEMBER_ID

SELECT MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_PW, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_NICNAME, MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_PHONE, MEMBER_ADDR , MEMBER_IP, MEMBER_GRADE , MEMBER_JOIN , MEMBER_NOTIFY, MEMBER_FACE, MEMBER_AUTO FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{member_id}

SELECT MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_PW, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_NICNAME, MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_PHONE, MEMBER_ADDR , MEMBER_IP, MEMBER_GRADE , MEMBER_JOIN , MEMBER_NOTIFY, MEMBER_FACE, MEMBER_AUTO FROM MEMBER WHERE (MEMBER_PHONE = #{member_phone} AND MEMBER_NAME = #{member_name}) OR (MEMBER_PHONE = #{member_phone} AND MEMBER_ID = #{member_id})
